member.name: T:ISO8583Net.Types.ISOFieldParticipation
member.summary: Indicates an ISO field participation in a message type.

member.name: F:ISO8583Net.Types.ISOFieldParticipation.MAN
member.summary: Mandatory, the field mast exist in the message type

member.name: F:ISO8583Net.Types.ISOFieldParticipation.OPT
member.summary: Optional, the field may exist in the message type

member.name: F:ISO8583Net.Types.ISOFieldParticipation.CON
member.summary: Conditional, the field mast exists in the message type if some conditions are met

member.name: T:ISO8583Net.Types.ISOFieldLengthFormat
member.summary: Indicates the length format used for the iso field. ISO Fields can have a fixed length format or a variable length format. When a variable length format is used, it means that some length indicator which indicates the length of the iso field preceeds the field data.

member.name: F:ISO8583Net.Types.ISOFieldLengthFormat.FIXED
member.summary: The field is of fixed length type. There is no length indicator

member.name: F:ISO8583Net.Types.ISOFieldLengthFormat.VAR
member.summary: The field is of varialble length type. There is a length indicator before the data

member.name: T:ISO8583Net.Types.ISOFieldCoding
member.summary: Defines the encoding of the ISO field value

member.name: F:ISO8583Net.Types.ISOFieldCoding.ASCII
member.summary: ISO field value is encoded in ASCII

member.name: F:ISO8583Net.Types.ISOFieldCoding.BCD
member.summary: ISO field value is encoded in BCD

member.name: F:ISO8583Net.Types.ISOFieldCoding.BCDU
member.summary: ISO field value is encoded in BCDU (BCD Unpacked)

member.name: F:ISO8583Net.Types.ISOFieldCoding.EBCDIC
member.summary: ISO field value is encoded in EBCDIC

member.name: F:ISO8583Net.Types.ISOFieldCoding.BIN
member.summary: ISO field value is encoded in BIN (Binary)

member.name: F:ISO8583Net.Types.ISOFieldCoding.Z
member.summary: ISO field value is encoded in Z (Track2 Encoding)

member.name: T:ISO8583Net.Types.ISOFieldPadding
member.summary: Defines the padding of the ISO field value

member.name: F:ISO8583Net.Types.ISOFieldPadding.LEFT
member.summary: Field is using left padding

member.name: F:ISO8583Net.Types.ISOFieldPadding.RIGHT
member.summary: Field is using right padding

member.name: F:ISO8583Net.Types.ISOFieldPadding.NONE
member.summary: Field is using no padding

member.name: T:ISO8583Net.Types.ISOFieldContent
member.summary: Defines the data content type

member.name: F:ISO8583Net.Types.ISOFieldContent.A
member.summary: Data consist only of alphabetic characters

member.name: F:ISO8583Net.Types.ISOFieldContent.AN
member.summary: Data consist only of alphabetic and numeric characters

member.name: F:ISO8583Net.Types.ISOFieldContent.ANP
member.summary: Data consist only of alphabetic characters

member.name: F:ISO8583Net.Types.ISOFieldContent.ANS
member.summary: Data consist only of alphabetic, numeric and special characters

member.name: F:ISO8583Net.Types.ISOFieldContent.AS
member.summary: Data consist only of alphabetic and special characters

member.name: F:ISO8583Net.Types.ISOFieldContent.HD
member.summary: Data consist only of hexadecimal digits

member.name: F:ISO8583Net.Types.ISOFieldContent.N
member.summary: Data consist only of numeric digits

member.name: F:ISO8583Net.Types.ISOFieldContent.NS
member.summary: Data consist only of numeric digits and special characters

member.name: F:ISO8583Net.Types.ISOFieldContent.TRACK2
member.summary: Data consist only of valid TRACK2 characters

member.name: T:ISO8583Net.Utils.ISOUtils
member.summary: The ISO8583Utils Class Contains all methods for performing fast conversion between different data types
member.remarks: This class can perform the below convertsions:

member.name: F:ISO8583Net.Utils.ISOUtils._os_toascii
member.summary: Static array for fast lookup to convert from ebcdic to ascii

member.name: F:ISO8583Net.Utils.ISOUtils._os_toebcdic
member.summary: Static array for fast lookup to convert from ascii to ebcdic

member.name: F:ISO8583Net.Utils.ISOUtils._lookup32
member.summary: Static array for fast lookup to convert from bytes to hex

Starting position for the sub array
Length of sub arrayt starting from postion index

member.summary: Extents array functionality by allowing to concatenate two arrays

The arrays to be concatanate to the previous array
